protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: This is one of the several different receptors for 5- hydroxytryptamine (serotonin), a biogenic hormone that functions as a neurotransmitter, a hormone, and a mitogen. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins that stimulate adenylate cyclase. It has a high affinity for tricyclic psychotropic drugs

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
